string.value: You defeated the #o9300274#s but it seems that #p1012118# still doesn't believe you. Talk to #b#p1012118##k.
#p1012118# denies the results and tells you to hunt #r#o9300274##ks once again. This time he wants you to hunt #r80#k of them... What an annoying guy.\r\n\r\n#o9300274##r #a225171##k
You passed #p1012118#'s second test. Will he accept the results this time?

No way! This can't be! I can't accept it! There is no way that a person recommended by Stan would have such skills... This is impossible!\r\n#b#L0#Ahem, so can I start using the Training Center now?#l\n#k
I can't accept it! You're using some sort of trick! Yes, that's it! Some high level adventurer passing by must have helped you! I'm right, aren't I?!\r\n#b#L0#No one helped me...#l\n#k
Ha, an instrument of Stan would have no problems telling a lie. I can't believe you! I will give you another test! This time, eliminate #r80 #o9300274##ks!
Hehehe, even a high level adventurer would be too annoyed to help you eliminate so many of them. This time, I will uncover your mask once and for all!
Puhaha... So I was right! It was all a lie. It wasn't a bad attempt but you're far from being able to trick me!
Huh?! You're back... You...you didn't...eliminate 80 #o9300274#s, did you? What? No way! This is not possible! It's all a lie!
You weren't able to eliminate #r80 #o9300274#s#k... Puhaha, that is what I figured. There is no way you have such skills!
